member.name: T:Sudoku.UI.Windows.App
member.summary: Provides application-specific behavior to supplement the default Application class.

member.name: F:Sudoku.UI.Windows.App._window
member.summary: Indicates the main window instance. The value will be initialized later instead of the constructor.

member.name: M:Sudoku.UI.Windows.App.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes the singleton application object. This is the first line of authored code executed, and as such is the logical equivalent of main() or WinMain().

member.name: M:Sudoku.UI.Windows.App.OnLaunched(Microsoft.UI.Xaml.LaunchActivatedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when the application is launched normally by the end user. Other entry points will be used such as when the application is launched to open a specific file.
member.param: Details about the launch request and process.

member.name: T:Sudoku.UI.Windows.MainWindow
member.summary: An empty window that can be used on its own or navigated to within a Frame.
